H3.text: when was the nobel prize for literature first awarded. 1901

A4.text: The first prize in 1901 was reported in hundreds of newspapers in different parts of the world.

A5.text: The Nobel Prize in Literature has been awarded 116 times between 1901 and 2024 to 121 individuals: 103 men and 18 women.
